column4: When I try to update with synaptic (or aptitude) it trows me a helluva of errors
When I try to update with synaptic (or aptitude) it trows me a helluva of errors
if I change http to ftp I get connection error 110
I've got the italian locale, so I dunno the precise error msg
Have you got any other repo added to list repos list? For example Tor, Medibuntu...
Have you tried disabling them and reloading again synaptic's program list?
o_O I reverted to http and now everything magically works :|
the overall fix was just setting anything .ubuntu.com to ftp, and anything else to http
Maybe you had wrong written server link.
:( now it complains about no such file or directory when actually updating :/
